resources.string: You can\'t have more than a total of 60 cards!\n(Prizes + Remaining Cards + Active Pokemons)
You can\'t have more than 6 active Pokemons!
No more remaining prizes!\n%1$s won the match!
No more remaining cards!\n%1$s won the match!
No more active Pokemon!\n%1$s won the match!
Party is over!\nPress \"Reset\" for a new party.
The Pokemon Trading Card Game logo.
